filters: List of filters applied to create cohort, if any.
last_date_saved: Last date the cohort was saved.
name: Name of cohort.
num_patients: Number of unique participant barcodes in the cohort.
num_samples: Number of unique sample barcodes in the cohort.
parent_id: ID of the parent cohort this cohort was derived from, if any.
perm: User permissions on cohort: READER or OWNER.
source_notes: Notes on the source of the cohort.
